message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly generous, split. I think it's a good starting point for negotiation.
Your offer was a bit too far off for me. Let's try something closer to the middle.
I'm willing to move closer to your offer, but I think a 60/40 split is more fair. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
We're getting closer.  I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers to finalize this.
